title: shrI ramaNa vijita
sahitya:
shrI ramaNa vijita madana dEvavara sAkEtAdhipa shESa shayana lOkAvana nipuNa mAm pAhi


anupallavi

  kanaka hAradhara varada lOkahita pApahara sarasa mrdula su-vacana 
kanaka vasanOllasita sadaya kabandha mada vinAshakara surEndranuta


caraNam 1    tArApati mada bhanjana tArAdhipa samavadana aghamOcana 
shrI lalita caraNa bhaktajanapAlA sadrsha vibudhanuta
    caraNam 2    niravadhi sukhakara sadaya hrdaya dashakaNTha ripu nAshacaNa 
vimata haraNOllasita sadaya sadAshiva kavi vinuta caraNayuga
